text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yamagata Prefecture, Tendo City… 
It seems that this place is famous for 
producing shogi pieces!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Since we're here, let's buy some lucky
shogi pieces as charms for everyone in
our dorm and class!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course, all of them will be "Kyosha" 
pieces! Because "Kyosha" always plays a 
fair and square game, bravely and never 
retreats――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So basically, an amazing piece like me!! 
My father said so, you know!!!
